Name: Must Assign Teams to Projects
Description: Every team must be assigned to at least one project

Name: Employees Must Have Skills
Description: Each employee must have at least one skill

Name: Scrum Master per Team
Description: Each team must be supported by exactly one Scrum Master

Name: Sprint Backlog Must Belong to Sprint
Description: Every sprint backlog is assigned to a sprint

Name: Feature Status Restrictions
Description: Features cannot be in â€˜Cancelledâ€™ status

Name: Max Task Effort per Sprint
Description: Total effort for tasks must not exceed sprint capacity

Name: Blocker Severity Limit
Description: Blockers with severity above a threshold are not allowed
